nodes.bodyText:
You forgot to add RefToReferenceMapper in the mapper class imports.
There should additionally be @Mapping(target = "targetRepository", qualifiedBy = IdEntity.class)
This particular line made the AbstractArtifactMapperImpl use toEntity() method when mapping Build but it should use toEntityReference() method.
(not a result of this PR) In AbstractArtifactMapperImpl::toDTO method, buildRecord is mapped with toDTO instead of toRef.
